name: Demo Pink Rush Speedrun Platformer
description:
Demo. Full version with 50+ levels on Google Play  Click here

Get ready for the ultimate platformer experience with "Pink Rush"! With 52 different levels to conquer, each with their own unique challenges, this 2D offline game offers hours of endless fun. Featuring simple movement mechanics, you'll have to tap and jump your way to victory and set the fastest times possible. The game's visually stunning graphics make every level come to life, with a lot of unique and funny surprises waiting for you along the way. Whether you're a seasoned speedrunner or new to the genre, "Pink Rush" offers a classic speedrun experience with easy-to-learn controls. Be a part of a breathtaking adventure and race against the clock to set the high scores. Download "Pink Rush" today and start your new favorite platforming journey!
